meanings.definition: A type of lipid found in cell membranes.
meanings.sent1: Cell membranes contain phosphatidylethanolamines to help with structure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the role of phosphatidylethanolamines in cell membranes.
meanings.sent3: The phosphatidylethanolamines in cell membranes were having a party, dancing around.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny bodyguards, phosphatidylethanolamines protect the cell membranes.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, phosphatidylethanolamines look like little building blocks of life.

meanings.sent1: Phosphatidylethanolamines are essential components of cell membranes.
meanings.sent2: The body uses phosphatidylethanolamines to build healthy cells.
meanings.sent3: The phosphatidylethanolamines whispered secrets to the other lipids in the cell.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of lipids, phosphatidylethanolamines stand out like stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Every cell relies on phosphatidylethanolamines for its survival and function.
